entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
